p: Malaria infection caused by P. berghei significantly increased ALT and AST activities in untreated mice compared to uninfected mice. Daily treatment with Tmsb w significantly prevented ALT and AST activity increase in infected mice by 27.03%, 18.45%, and 64.80% (ALT) and by 88.29% and 92.54% (AST) at increasing doses of extract, respectively ( Table 4).
